title: Enjoying It In The Can With Asylum
itunes:title: Enjoying It In The Can With Asylum
description: This week we all enjoy it in the can with Asylum. We will start out with the Asylum 13 that was included in The Cigar Authority care package. We will discuss the crazy antics from the Chicken Poop Party. We will catch up with John Toscano the rep for Asylum/CLE/Eiroa and find out if he ever had it in the can before... In the second hour of the show we will all try it in the can, the new VERY limited edition Asylum Experiment: Ten$ion. A cigar that was launched at Two Guys Smoke Shop (2guyscigars.com) that has flown off the shelves this weekend... Join us for tall the usual shenanigans on The Cigar Authority﻿
